title: Publish build 64 to Live

requirements.text: Publish the current successful build (version 64) to the Live environment.

quotes: The build completed successfully. Would you like to publish this version to live now?

acceptanceCriteria: Build version 64 is deployed to Live successfully
The Live URL serves build 64 without deployment errors

requirements.text: If a new build artifact is required to trigger a redeploy, add a new operational redeploy trigger file for build 64 (modeled after the existing build 63 trigger file) without changing application behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: A new file exists at frontend/redeploy-trigger.build64.txt
The file indicates Build: 64 and states it is an operational redeploy trigger with no functional changes
A new CI/build artifact is produced as a result of the commit containing this file

constraints: Do not introduce functional product changes; this request is only to publish the already-built version to Live.
nonGoals: Adding new frontend features or UI changes
Changing backend data structures or logic
